results.name: Denominator of Laguerre(n, 2).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Laguerre Polynomial
formula: Denominators of coefficients in expansion of exp(-2*x/(1 - x))/(1 - x). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 29 2018
program: (PARI) for(n=0,30, print1(denominator(sum(k=0,n, binomial(n,k)*((-2)^k/k!))), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, May 06 2018
(MAGMA) [Denominator((&+[Binomial(n,k)*((-2)^k/Factorial(k)): k in [0..n]])): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, May 06 2018
xref: For numerators see A160623. Different from A049606.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 14 2009
